tasks.title: Orchestration System Design

tasks.title: Orchestration Phase 1: Core Routing & Conflict Detection

tasks.title: Orchestration Phase 3: Queue System & Polish
tasks.description: Implementering av køsystem (FIFO/prioritet), auto-escalation, testing, og final deployment. Inkluderer komprehensiv testing og performance optimization.

tasks.title: Phase 2: Webhook Integration
tasks.description: Add webhooks for automatic task pickup so Nikoline can receive tasks directly from Kanban
